description.header: Hey there, welcome to the verification zone🛡️
description.body: Before we get you up and running, we need a few things to make sure you're legit.

step1.firstName: Your first name - make it official, not your favorite alias!
step1.lastName: Your last name, exactly how it appears on your ID.
step1.email: Your go-to email for updates and news. Don't worry, no spam here!

address.fullAddress: Your full address, street, city, and more. We like to keep things clear!

step1.phoneNumber: Your main contact number. We'll only use it if we absolutely need to!

steps.undefined: Start filling out your details, and we’ll guide you through the process step by step - it’s super easy!

form.companyName: The name of your company or brand. Keep it official but recognizable!
form.registrationCode: Your company’s unique registration or tax code. Helps us stay compliant!
form.email: Your main contact email. We’ll send you updates and important info here.

address.street: The street name where your office is located. Make it precise!
address.city: The city where your office or HQ is based. E.g., Berlin, New York.
address.state: Your state or province. Skip it if it’s not applicable!
address.region: The broader region for your location. Helps for global users!
address.postalCode: Your postal or ZIP code to ensure accurate deliveries (if needed).
address.country: Your country of operation. Let us know where you’re working from!
address.houseNumber: Your building or house number. Optional, but can be helpful!

form.phoneNumber: Your primary phone number. We might call to verify your details.
form.country: The country you’ll mostly operate in. Feel free to specify here again!
form.description: A short, snappy description of your company or what you do. Sell yourself here!
